title: Show 59 - (Blitz) The Destroyer of Worlds
itunes:title: (Blitz) The Destroyer of Worlds
description: What happens if human beings can't handle the power of their own weaponry? This show  examines the dangerous early years of the Nuclear Age and humankind's efforts to avoid self-destruction at the hands of its own creation.
itunes:subtitle: What happens if human beings can't handle the power of their own weaponry? This show  examines the dangerous early years of the Nuclear Age and humankind's efforts to avoid self-destruction at the hands of its own creation.
itunes:summary: What happens if human beings can't handle the power of their own weaponry? This show  examines the dangerous early years of the Nuclear Age and humankind's efforts to avoid self-destruction at the hands of its own creation.
itunes:keywords: Atomic, nuclear, hydrogen, thermonuclear, war, Oppenheimer, Truman, Eisenhower, Kennedy, Cold War, World War, Curtis LeMay, Cuban Missile Crisis, Korean War, Hiroshima, Nagasaki
